channel.title: Ftp on jrobb.org
channel.description: Recent content in Ftp on jrobb.org

item.title: I got bored... so Creating a www server
item.description: Over the weekend I had some time and then decided to do something I had always wanted to do: create an http server. I was using my desktop, which runs [Arch](http://archlinux.org" target="_blank) of course, and went through several of [these links](http://fqnet.proboards.com/index.cgi?board=nix&amp;action=display&amp;thread=56&amp;page=1" target="_blank) and set my desktop up with Apache, PHP, and MySQL. Also, I installed vsftp as an FTP server. I even signed up with DynDNS so that my dynamic IP can be updated to a (sub)domain and etc etc.
